import axios from'axios';// ** Get Tasks
export var getTasks=function getTasks(params){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/todo/tasks',{params:params}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_TASKS',tasks:res.data,params:params});});};};// ** Re-order Tasks on drag
export var reOrderTasks=function reOrderTasks(tasks){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'REORDER_TASKS',tasks:tasks});};};// ** ADD Task
export var addTask=function addTask(task){return function(dispatch,getState){axios.post('/apps/todo/add-tasks',{task:task}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'ADD_TASK',task:res.data});}).then(dispatch(getTasks(getState().todo.params)));};};// ** Update Tasks
export var updateTask=function updateTask(task){return function(dispatch,getState){axios.post('/apps/todo/update-task',{task:task}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'UPDATE_TASK',task:res.data});}).then(dispatch(getTasks(getState().todo.params)));};};// ** Delete Task
export var deleteTask=function deleteTask(taskId){return function(dispatch,getState){axios.delete('/apps/todo/delete-task',{taskId:taskId}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'DELETE_TASK',task:res.data});}).then(function(){return dispatch(getTasks(getState().todo.params));});};};// ** Select Task
export var selectTask=function selectTask(task){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SELECT_TASK',task:task});};};
